script.caption: Michael Jackson in a futuristic lab, holding a small bottle with glowing pills.

dialogue.text: I see beauty being timeless, age being just a number.
As he gently rotates the bottle, the pills inside emit a soft, radiant glow.

script.caption: Close up of Michael Jackson's face, his skin flawless and youthful.

dialogue.text: My secret? It's simple. It's these anti-aging pills.
His radiant smile warms the frosty laboratory as the camera zooms in on the uncanny innocence in his eyes.

script.caption: Rotating 3D model of the anti-aging pill with microscopic details appearing around it.

dialogue.text: Built from ground-breaking technology, this pill has the potential to put a hold on time itself.

script.caption: Michael Jackson throws back a pill with a glass of water, winking at the camera.

dialogue.text: With a wink, Michael throws back the pill, an iconic pop-star yet a living testament to the miracles of modern science.
